p: Escherichia coli ATCC25922 (E. coli), Staphylococcus aureus ATCC25923 (S. aureus), Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC27853 (P. aeruginosa), Penicillium italicum Wehmer (P. italicum Wehmer), and Penicillium digitatum Sacc. (P. digitatum Sacc.) were obtained from the China Center for Type Culture Collection (Wuhan University, China).
